snippet: In expressing his support for same-sex marriage, which remains a controversial issue, President Obama has clearly come to recognize that the forces of history appear to be changing.
abstract: News analysis; Pres Obama's endorsement of same-sex marriage is by any measure a watershed, providing the most powerful evidence to date of how rapidly views are moving on issue that was politically toxic just five years ago; he faces considerable risk in jumping into this debate, reluctantly or not, in the heat of what is expected to be a close presidential election; seven of nine states expected to be close in the election have laws or provisions that prohibit same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: In expressing his support for same-sex marriage, which remains a controversial issue, President Obama has clearly come to recognize that the forces of history appear to be changing.

headline.seo: Obama’s Watershed Move on Gay Marriage
headline.main: A Watershed Move, Both Risky and Inevitable
headline.print_headline: A Watershed Move, Both Risky and Inevitable

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
